<script>
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
  // ========== ç»Ÿè®¡æ•°å­—å®æ—¶è®¡ç®— ==========
  const listingItems = document.querySelectorAll('#papers-listing .quarto-listing-default .list-item, #papers-listing .quarto-post, #papers-listing .g-col-1');
  const paperCount = listingItems.length;
  
  // æ›´æ–°è®ºæ–‡æ•°é‡
  const paperCountEl = document.getElementById('paper-count');
  if (paperCountEl) {
    paperCountEl.textContent = paperCount > 0 ? paperCount : '0';
  }
  
  // ç»Ÿè®¡åˆ†ç±»æ•°é‡
  const categories = new Set();
  document.querySelectorAll('#papers-listing .listing-category, #papers-listing .quarto-category').forEach(cat => {
    categories.add(cat.textContent.trim());
  });
  const categoryCountEl = document.getElementById('category-count');
  if (categoryCountEl) {
    categoryCountEl.textContent = categories.size > 0 ? categories.size : '0';
  }
  
  // è·å–æœ€è¿‘æ›´æ–°æ—¥æœŸ
  const dates = document.querySelectorAll('#papers-listing .listing-date');
  if (dates.length > 0) {
    const latestDateEl = document.getElementById('latest-date');
    if (latestDateEl) {
      latestDateEl.textContent = dates[0].textContent.trim().slice(0, 7) || '-';
    }
  }
  
  // ========== 3D æ°”æ³¡ç½‘ç»œ ==========
  const container = document.getElementById('paper-network-3d');
  if (!container) return;
  
  // æ”¶é›†è®ºæ–‡æ•°æ®
  const papers = [];
  listingItems.forEach((item, index) => {
    const titleEl = item.querySelector('.listing-title a, .post-title a, a');
    const categoryEl = item.querySelector('.listing-category, .quarto-category');
    if (titleEl) {
      papers.push({
        title: titleEl.textContent.trim(),
        url: titleEl.href,
        category: categoryEl ? categoryEl.textContent.trim() : 'æœªåˆ†ç±»'
      });
    }
  });
  
  // å¦‚æœæ²¡æœ‰è®ºæ–‡ï¼Œæ˜¾ç¤ºç¤ºä¾‹æ°”æ³¡
  if (papers.length === 0) {
    papers.push(
      { title: 'å‘å¸ƒä½ çš„ç¬¬ä¸€ç¯‡è®ºæ–‡ç¬”è®°', url: '#', category: 'å¼€å§‹' },
      { title: 'ç‚¹å‡»è¿™é‡Œäº†è§£å¦‚ä½•æ·»åŠ ', url: 'about.qmd', category: 'å¸®åŠ©' }
    );
  }
  
  // åˆ›å»º 3D åœºæ™¯
  const scene = document.createElement('div');
  scene.className = 'bubble-scene';
  container.appendChild(scene);
  
  // ç”Ÿæˆæ°”æ³¡
  const bubbles = [];
  const radius = 120;
  papers.forEach((paper, i) => {
    const bubble = document.createElement('a');
    bubble.className = 'paper-bubble';
    bubble.href = paper.url;
    bubble.setAttribute('data-title', paper.title);
    bubble.setAttribute('data-category', paper.category);
    
    // çƒé¢åˆ†å¸ƒ
    const phi = Math.acos(-1 + (2 * i + 1) / papers.length);
    const theta = Math.sqrt(papers.length * Math.PI) * phi;
    
    const x = radius * Math.cos(theta) * Math.sin(phi);
    const y = radius * Math.sin(theta) * Math.sin(phi);
    const z = radius * Math.cos(phi);
    
    bubble.style.setProperty('--x', x + 'px');
    bubble.style.setProperty('--y', y + 'px');
    bubble.style.setProperty('--z', z + 'px');
    
    // æ°”æ³¡å†…å®¹
    bubble.innerHTML = '<span class="bubble-dot"></span><span class="bubble-label">' + paper.title.slice(0, 20) + (paper.title.length > 20 ? '...' : '') + '</span>';
    
    scene.appendChild(bubble);
    bubbles.push({ el: bubble, x, y, z });
  });
  
  // ä¸­å¿ƒèŠ‚ç‚¹
  const centerBubble = document.createElement('div');
  centerBubble.className = 'center-bubble';
  centerBubble.innerHTML = 'ğŸ§ ';
  scene.appendChild(centerBubble);
  
  // é¼ æ ‡è·Ÿéšæ—‹è½¬
  let rotateX = 0, rotateY = 0;
  let targetRotateX = 0, targetRotateY = 0;
  
  container.addEventListener('mousemove', (e) => {
    const rect = container.getBoundingClientRect();
    const centerX = rect.left + rect.width / 2;
    const centerY = rect.top + rect.height / 2;
    
    targetRotateY = ((e.clientX - centerX) / rect.width) * 30;
    targetRotateX = -((e.clientY - centerY) / rect.height) * 30;
  });
  
  container.addEventListener('mouseleave', () => {
    targetRotateX = 0;
    targetRotateY = 0;
  });
  
  // åŠ¨ç”»å¾ªç¯
  function animate() {
    rotateX += (targetRotateX - rotateX) * 0.1;
    rotateY += (targetRotateY - rotateY) * 0.1;
    
    scene.style.transform = `rotateX(${rotateX}deg) rotateY(${rotateY}deg)`;
    
    requestAnimationFrame(animate);
  }
  animate();
});
</script>
